trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the connection strings configuration-file section.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso programático à seção do arquivo de configuração das cadeias de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection> class allows you to programmatically modify the `connectionStrings` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection> classe permite que você modificar programaticamente o `connectionStrings` seção do arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The connection strings are provided as a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> of <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>`add` configuration elements.
trans-unit.target: As cadeias de caracteres de conexão são fornecidas como um <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> de <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> `add` elementos de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection>.

trans-unit.source: The following excerpt shows the configuration used by the previous example.
trans-unit.target: O trecho a seguir mostra a configuração usada pelo exemplo anterior.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection.ConnectionStrings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection.ConnectionStrings%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringsSection> objeto.
